00035 /*
00036 *       A GMDP source which can be controlled by the Start-Stop-protocol.
00037 *
00038 *       Additional input:       src->Start
00039 */
00040 #ifndef GMDPSTOP_INCL
00041 #define GMDPSTOP_INCL
00042 
00043 #include "gmdp.h"
00044 
00045 #define TRIAL_MAX       (10000)         /* max # of trials to leave a zero bit rate state (GMDP) */
00046 
00047 //tolua_begin
00048 class   gmdpstop: public gmdpsrc 
00049 {
00050   typedef gmdpsrc       baseclass;
00051 public:
00052   gmdpstop(void);
00053   ~gmdpstop(void);
00054   void restim(void);
00055   rec_typ send_state;   // running or stopped?
00056   tim_typ next_time;    // intended time before stop
00057   //tolua_end
00058   rec_typ REC(data *, int);     // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00059   void early(event *);
00060 }; //tolua_export
00061 
00062 #endif
